abstract: Federal Judge Kimba Wood dismisses civil lawsuit filed by Yulia V Tymoshenko, former Ukrainian prime minister and presidential candidate found guilty in 2011 for abusing power; Tymoshenko accused Dimitry V Firtash and other political opponents of running American-based money-laundering operation that lead to her defeat in presidential race and incarceration.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Manhattan on Friday dismissed a civil lawsuit filed by Yulia V. Tymoshenko, the former Ukrainian prime minister and presidential candidate.

headline.main: Ukraine: U.S. Judge Tosses Tymoshenko Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: U.S. Judge Tosses Out Tymoshenko Lawsuit

snippet: A federal judge in Manhattan on Friday dismissed a civil lawsuit filed by Yulia V. Tymoshenko, the former Ukrainian prime minister and presidential candidate.
